DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects F-Secure events from the Policy Manager Server H2 embedded database.
DefaultReaderConfiguration.idQuery: SELECT MAX(a.id) FROM alerts AS a
DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alerts AS a WHERE a.id > ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT a.time, a.id, a.oid_id, dt.host_identity, a.user_name, a.message_params, ia.action_performed, a.severity, a.non_localized_message, a.report_id FROM alerts AS a LEFT JOIN infection_alerts AS ia ON ia.Alert_ID = a.ID LEFT JOIN domain_tree AS dt ON dt.ID = a.domain_id WHERE a.time > ? ORDER BY a.id

string.toolTipText: Date and time in milliseconds since epoch
Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)
